General.Name: Nankang Rubber Tire Corp Ltd
General.Description: Nankang Rubber Tire Corp.,Ltd. manufactures and sells tires and various rubber supplies in Taiwan, China, the United States, Europe, rest of Asia, and internationally. It offers passenger car, SUV and 4X4 WD, winter, all season, motorsport, light truck, motorcycle, and bus and trailer tires. The company was founded in 1959 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.136, Sec.3, Jen Ai Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 106465
